page.title: 02Housing in N.St Ives.
page.content: The houses in the North of St.Ives are all modern houses ,some recent and some built up to ten years ago.The houses are recommended by their owners because of the peace and quiet in spite of the occasional plane coming over. Most of the new people who are starting to settle in find that the North of St.Ives public are very friendly.They only move because they need a job,or to get nearer to the town.You'll mostly find that people who have moved from one part of St.Ives move to another part of St.Ives.All of the houses are of brick construction.Some houses have a brick structure instead of a wooden one.The houses that are and were built from a wooden frame have been known to be fire risks.There are houses for singles and married people in St.Ives.
